answers.answer: Listen, I would STRIVE to get off the meds and just start eating better, exercising. I did [I HATE exercise- I just do a little, but lost some weight].   Dr's are trained to prescribe EVERYTHING.  I worked for one- drug reps give kickbacks- I GUARANTEE it.I prefer natural supplements.  There is a site- they seem to have the BEST prices of any I have found- iherb[dot]com.  Go type 'erectile dysfunction' into their search and see what pops up to help you.  The other thing- most cinnamon we get is not real- go to a store and get ORGANIC, natural cinnamon.  It lowers blood sugar.  There are other things that do it too.P.S.  If you learn some other things, the actual erection is not the big thing that will keep us around....

question: i have diabetes and my blood sugar was running in the 200 for about a month, i have it now under control (med adjustment) but now im experiencing ED.   what if anything can i do about it? i have already seen my doctor who perscribed viagra but im not interested in takin ... [More] g that.  i would like something natural.  i heard someone ask about nerve blend SP-14 where would i begin to look for those products?  would they be at a GNC store?
title: ED repair/where do i go
